Reviews.Content: Great Find       The view of the lake! Taken from standing up on the balcony.
Reviews.Author: MinnesotaTravelBug_4

Reviews.Content: staff made the stay even more enjoyable My family stayed at Lago Vista for our family vacation. Thomas went above and beyond to help make our stay comfortable. Very clean and well kept. The view is breathtaking. My daughters enjoyed the pool and pool table. We hope to leave Philly and travel there again next summer.
Reviews.Author: mermert

Reviews.Content: Amazing Honeymoon! My husband and I stood here for our honeymoon, the drive from the airport was a little too much, however! once we got there we were in paradise..it was worth the drive.the place is simply beautiful...the owners were great, we stayed in October so the place was empty but they made sure that we were so well taken care of....we are going back this year....but this time were taking our children...We had the best time....we just didnt' want to leave
Reviews.Author: mari74

Reviews.Content: Loved the place beautiful sorroundings, excellent food and drinks. Went to see the place and decided to stay for a night, that finally became 2, hated to leave, but came back home a new person,Tranquility and the beauty of the area overwhelmed me. Recommend it highly.
Reviews.Author: CreacionesElsa

Reviews.Content: Simply AWSOME       View to the pool  the Guajataca lake
Reviews.Author: yjs721

Reviews.Content: Loved It! We only had a chance to stay one night, but we cannot say enough good about this place. Simple and elegant at the same time. The most wonderful owner/host you could ever ask for. The very best hospitality, and best puerto rican food of the whole trip!! We never wanted to leave, and will certainly return.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
